title: The Who Live in Hyde Park (Video 2015)

cast.name: John Corey
cast.character: Himself - piano, keyboards, backing vocals, percussion, bass harmonica

cast.name: Loren Gold
cast.character: Himself - keyboards, backing vocals, percussion, jaw harp

cast.name: Frank Simes
cast.character: Himself - keyboards, backing vocals, percussion, banjo

cast.name: Simon Townshend
cast.character: Himself - rhythm guitar, acoustic guitar, vocals

overview: The Who’s epic 50th Anniversary Tour finale show, recorded at Hyde Park. Experience all the greatest hits including ‘Who Are You’, ‘My Generation’, ‘I Can See For Miles’, ‘Pinball Wizard’, ‘See Me Feel Me’, ‘Baba O’Riley’ and ‘Won’t Get Fooled Again’. Plus Pete Townshend, Roger Daltrey, Iggy Pop, Robert Plant, Johnny Marr and others share their stories of the band’s history and influence as legendary pioneers of British Rock.
storyline: 50 year anniversary of The Who. The Who are playing a concert in Hyde Park London, England of there favorite songs .
